title: Add catalyst node with domain peer.decentraland.zone to the catalyst network
body:
> by 0x8cff6832174091dae86f0244e3fd92d4ced2fe07 (frami)

Should the catalyst node with the domain peer.decentraland.zone and owner 0x8cff6832174091dae86f0244e3fd92d4ced2fe07 be added to Decentraland's Catalyst Network?

## Description

Explain why this node should be added to the Catalyst network. Why would this addition be beneficial to the network? For example, adding nodes in new geographic areas helps to provide a better experience to more users.

**[Vote on this proposal on the Decentraland DAO](https://governance.decentraland.io/en/proposal?id=542b2bc0-bc90-11eb-a36a-b5b6267e4f44)**
author: 0x2Ba0352480bd1Ea073A83e6639b06362131894CE
